headline: Palantir CEO Alex Karp Pays Record $120 Million for Colorado Monastery
summary: Palantir  CEO  Alex Karp  has paid a record $120 million for a ranch outside  Aspen  Colo., that was used for decades as a monastery, according to a source with knowledge of the deal.  Located in Snowmass, about 30 minutes from Aspen, St. Benedict’s Monastery was listed for $150 million last year, said Ken Mirr of Mirr Ranch Group, one of the listing agents.  The deal is the priciest residential sale to date in Colorado’s Pitkin County, Mirr said.
